title: Habitat One: A Journey Across A Galaxy
description: Follow the adventures of 5100 Death Row convicts and their descendants across five generations in a sealed habitat in space. Their lives show that human history repeats itself and that while resources are finite, life is infinite. Some characters you might love or loathe. You decide if they left Earth in the near future or arrived on Earth in the distant past. Human destiny is fulfilled.
author: Joanne Thomas
